title: Nails By Mei Watch Face
summary: Nail the time every time with these animated creations by Miho ‘Mei’ Kawajiri.
description: Animated creations adapted from hand-drawn illustrations created by Japanese celebrity nail artist Mei Kawajiri (also known as "CiaoManhattan2012"). A series of 12 unique vignettes adds unexpected, playful style to your ordinary Android Wear watch.
descriptionHTML: Animated creations adapted from hand-drawn illustrations created by Japanese celebrity nail artist Mei Kawajiri (also known as "CiaoManhattan2012"). A series of 12 unique vignettes adds unexpected, playful style to your ordinary Android Wear watch.
comments: Missing I have updated to 5.0.1. But this watch face is still no way can be found in my Sony SmartWatch 3.
Love it! I love my nail polish so this is great
